column4: i want to start program trought ssh and logout, but i need to program still work. How can i do it?
if it's a shell program use screen <program> then detach screen with C-a C-D
yeah screen will work for that
ctrl+a puts screen in command mode
screen works the same on any distro but fedora does do some odd things can ask in #fedora
are you running rtorrent in screen?
did you type screen rtorrent to start rtorrent inside screen?
since ctrl+a will do nothing you need to press ctrl+d after ctrl+a
you should see something that states [detached]
ok your doing it wrong that's why
screen rtorrent is the command you want
type screen rtorrent and then ctrl+a ctrl+d and then logout and it will work
screen is wonderful if you use a lot of console apps or want to have multiple "windows" open in just one console
screen -r to reattach it to detach it the same way as you did before
